title: Talon
overview: Talon is a sci-fi/fantasy narrative set in the late Cretaceous period, focusing on a young misfit Dakotaraptor named Talon. Unlike her ferocious peers, she is intelligent, empathetic, and seeks camaraderie, setting her apart in a world governed by survival of the fittest. Her unique traits attract Zekyr, an enigmatic otherworldly entity who, along with his acolyte Azirak, recruits Talon to help combat the Vair'un, a conquering army threatening the cosmos. As she embarks on a perilous journey, Talon faces numerous challenges that test her resolve, learning that true strength comes from understanding and friendship, resulting in a found family that will reshape the prehistoric world.
